channel.title: Karpoke - Just another Pelican blog - NAND

item.title: SSD breakthrough means 300% speed boost, 60% less power usage... even on old drives
item.description: A breakthrough has been made in SSD technology that could mean drastic performance increases due to the overcoming of one of the major issues in the memory type. Currently, data cannot be directly overwritten onto the NAND chips used in the devices. Files must be written to a clean area â€¦
item.dc:creator: Nacho Cano
